Description: Body sherd of Chian pottery Type B kantharos; discoloured white slip; interior: glazed black (partly lost); exterior: reserved with single brown band at bottom of sherd; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number '83' is written in pencil on the sherd's exterior surface. According to Williams (See Williams, D. ‘Aigina, Aphaia-Tempel 5. The pottery from Chios’, Archäologischer Anzeiger 1983, 169), Type B2 kantharoi have no exterior decoration except for a single band at the handle level, perhaps like the one on this sherd.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1698) (phase 2)
